analyzed: svayaṃbhū stavaḥ
namaḥ te viśvarūpāya jyotīrūpāya te namaḥ
namaḥ svayaṃbhave nityam jagat uddhāra hetave

original: tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva-
analyzed: tvam buddhaḥ tvam ca dharmaḥ daśabala tanayaḥ tvam tathā bodhisattva

original: stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ |
analyzed: stvam bhikṣuḥ śrāvakaḥ tvam kuliśa vara dharaḥ tvam tathā dharmadhātuḥ

original: tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ
analyzed: tvam brahmā tvam ca viṣṇuḥ pramatha gaṇa patiḥ tvam mahā indraḥ yamaḥ tvam

original: tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ ||2 ||
analyzed: tvam pāśī tvam dhaneśaḥ tvam anala pavanau nairṛtaḥ tvam maheśaḥ
bhūtāḥ pretāḥ ca tiryak tvam amaram aditi mārnavāḥ tvam vayam ca
cāturyoniḥ tvam eva triguṇa vara tanuḥ pañca jñāna eka mūrtiḥ
varṇāḥ tvam kāla māsāḥ dinam api rajanī pañca bhūtāḥ tvam eva

original: annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: annam ratnam ca sarvam matiḥ ati mahatī naḥ sadā tvām natāḥ smaḥ  /

original: pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca-
analyzed: pañca jñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayam atho bodhisattvān ca pañca
bhūtān etān guṇān trīn aja hari giriśān sthāvarān jaṅgamān ca

original: sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako'si
analyzed: sarveṣām cetasi sthaḥ naṭayasi sakalam sarvatas rakṣakaḥ asi

original: tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 4 ||
analyzed: tvam bījam ca aṅkuraḥ tvam phalam api viṭapī sarvadā tvām natāḥ smaḥ

original: śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
analyzed: śreṣṭham kṣatram tvam asmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvatas sarva devān
grāmān tīrthāni deśān nṛpa sahita narān naigamān ca api sarvān

original: dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
analyzed: dvīpeṣu anyeṣu api tvam vibhajasi sakalam jyotiṣām saṃvibhāgam
bījībhūta eka dīpaḥ asi akhilam api jagat vayāpakaḥ tvām natāḥ smaḥ
jyotiḥ tvadīyam paritas visāri sita aruṇa śyāmaka pīta raktam

original: dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam || 6 ||
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tatas sarvam idam bhavantam manyāmahe tvām praṇatāḥ sma nityam
nutim mahā rāja kṛtām ye paṭhiṣyanti mānavāḥ
cakravarti padam prāpya te hi muktim avāpnuyuḥ
śrī cāturmahārāja kṛtam svayaṃbhū stavam samāptam
